sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Smoke Detector Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Smoke Detector Act.

sections.heading: For the purposes of this Act:
sections.text: For the purposes of this Act:

sections.heading: (a) Every dwelling unit or hotel shall be equipped with at least one
sections.text:
approved smoke detector in an operating condition within 15 feet of every room
used for sleeping purposes. The detector shall be installed on the ceiling
and at least 6 inches from any wall, or on a wall located between 4 and 6
inches from the ceiling.

sections.heading: (a) Except as provided in subsection (c), willful failure to install or maintain in operating condition any
sections.text: smoke detector required by this Act shall be a Class B misdemeanor.
